attributes.action: Do not postpone any local elections in may 2026 .
attributes.additional_details: KEEP ALL THE LOCAL ELECTIONS IN MAY 2026 ON
attributes.background: I dont want the government to postpone any local elections next year . I feel it is a way of corruption . The government cancelled local elections last year which i feel was not right . Other political party’s might have won the council control .

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

The Government haven't announced that they will postpone the local elections in 2026.
